com.konakartadmin.bl

Class ERPQueueReader

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • com.konakartadmin.bl.ERPQueueReader
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class ERPQueueReader
extends java.lang.Thread
    Thread which runs forever. At a regular interval it reads the MQ Queue

    • Nested Class Summary

      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      private class  ERPQueueReader.KKEngines
      Class used to transport the admin and App engines

      Class to keep track of the message count
